data.title: Copa América 2024: All Teams Confirmed Player Rosters
data.meta_description: The 16 Team’s Rosters for the 48th Edition of the Copa América
data.text:
The confirmed rosters for CONMEBOL Copa América™

The 16 Team’s Rosters for the 48th Edition of the Copa América

CONMEBOL has closed the player registration process for CONMEBOL Copa América USA 2024™.

The player registration limit per country is 26 athletes.

On June 15, the rosters of the 16 teams participating in CONMEBOL Copa América USA 2024™ were confirmed.

Each team had the opportunity to register up to 26 players in the world's oldest national team tournament.

The 48th edition of CONMEBOL Copa América™ will begin on June 20, with the match between Argentina and Canada at Mercedes-Benz Stadium, and will conclude on July 14 with the Final at Hard Rock Stadium.

In addition to the 10 CONMEBOL member associations, 6 CONCACAF teams will join this edition: United States, Mexico, Panama, Jamaica, Costa Rica, and Canada (debuting in the tournament).

The Groups of the CONMEBOL Copa América™ are:

Group A: Argentina, Peru, Chile, Canada.

Group B: Mexico, Ecuador, Venezuela, Jamaica.

Group C: United States, Uruguay, Panama, Bolivia.

Group D: Brazil, Colombia, Paraguay, Costa Rica.

Tickets are available for sale through copaamerica.com. Fans are invited to purchase their seats as soon as possible.

Confirmed team rosters:

Group A

Defenders: 4-Gonzalo Montiel (Nottingham Forest), 26-Nahuel Molina (Atlético Madrid), 13-Cristian Romero (Tottenham), 6-Germán Pezzella (Real Betis), 2-Lucas Martínez Quarta (Fiorentina), 19-Nicolás Otamendi (Benfica), 25-Lisandro Martínez (Manchester United), 8-Marcos Acuña (Sevilla), 3-Nicolás Tagliafico (Lyon).
